11310.title: The terms for this service are translated into different languages

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are translated into different languages
tosdr.tldr: The privacy policy, aswell as many of their legal documentation, are translated into 30+ different languages

11504.quoteText: Some of our web pages use electronic markers (web beacons) that we use to obtain comprehensive statistics regarding the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns and other operations.
11504.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

11505.quoteText:
We use different types of "cookies" (small text files that are placed on your device):

  • user input cookies;
  • authentication cookies;
  • cookies storing your preferences and settings;
  • performance cookies;
  • security (antifraud) cookies;
  • third party advertising cookies
11505.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

11506.quoteText:
we use the data to:

  • ensure the performance of a contract with users and to ensure the required performance of services for customers;
  • protect the user from known threats to information security;
  • improve user interaction and experience with our services, in particular, changing interfaces and providing the desired content and advertisements related to marketing purpose;
11506.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

11508.quoteText:
Right of access. This enables you to receive a copy of the Personal Data we process about you and to check that we are lawfully processing it.
  • Right to rectification. Request correction of the Personal Data that we process about you.
  • Right to erasure (Right to be forgotten). This enables you to ask us to delete or remove Personal Data where there is no good reason for us continuing to process it
11508.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

11512.quoteText: To collect comprehensive statistics on the use of Kaspersky Business Hub by website visitors, we may use various analytical services (third parties).
11512.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

11514.quoteText: We do not ask you for, access or track any location based information from your device.
11514.title: This service does not collect, use, or share location data

tosdr.case: This service does not collect, use, or share location data

11515.quoteText:
How long do we keep your personal data

Data is deleted no later than 1 (one) calendar month after the account is deleted.
11515.title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

tosdr.case: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

11604.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms
